ModulePrefs.title: Virtual Biology Lab - Logistic Growth
ModulePrefs.author: Sten Govaerts
ModulePrefs.description: This model illustrates resource-limited population growth. Populations have a per-capita growth rate and carrying capacity. Two populations are compared on three graphs: N vs time, dN/dt vs N, and dN/Ndt vs N. Individuals in the populations are viewed in windows, illustrating that even at carrying capacity, there are still births and deaths in the population.
